title.rendered: Staff Profile: Victoria Tringale  Scientific Recruiter  Research Triangle Park and North Carolina

content.rendered:
Victoria Tringale, Scientific Recruiter: Research Triangle Park and North Carolina

Phone: (919) 904-4666
Connect on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/victoriatringale/

 

“My goal is to connect the best talent with top biotech/pharma firms and startups in RTP and greater NC. Here to help with research and development, manufacturing, quality and operations.”

To hiring managers and recruiters: Let me help fill your scientific job openings!

To candidates: Send me your resume!

 

ABOUT VICTORIA

Graduate of the University of Massachusetts

What is the best thing about your job?  Seeing candidates I placed happy in their new roles and working with my team. We love office days because we get to be together!

What makes you good at your job? Patience, persistence, and making a lot of connections.

What do you do for fun? I love going on walks, spending time with my dogs, and hanging with my friends and family!
